37045.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「北東にゃあ エ:
In the northeast, there's a huge salt lake where you can mine something called Eze Salt.
I'll sing you us salt pickers' song: ♪ Yuuum ♪ Savory, but sweet ♪ Iiit's! Eezee Salt!! ♪

39066.<pc>は ツボの中から\nエゼソルト（だいじなもの）を 手に入れた！<me_6:
<pc> received the
Eze Salt (Key Item) from the pot!<me_60>

37111.「北東にゃあ エゼソルトっつー塩を採取できる\n 巨大な 塩湖があるだよ～。\n:
In the northeast, there's a huge salt lake where you can mine something called Eze Salt.
You Rangao Village's Village King Cliffgain's grocery-getter? It's been a long time since the Village King sent out a grocery-getter to collect salt!
As soon as you enter Salt Lake, there's salt towers. Nearby's a pot of good salt nearby, so feel free to take as much as you want with you.
You'll know the salt towers, when you see 'em. Take care and get outta here.

37112.「塩湖に入ると すぐに 塩の塔があるだよ。\n その近くのツボに いい塩が入って:
As soon as you enter Salt Lake, there's salt towers. Nearby's a pot of good salt nearby, so feel free to take as much as you want with you.
You'll know the salt towers, when you see 'em. Take care and get outta here.
